github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Always follow the Angular Commit Message Guideline (feat, fix, chore, docs, style, refactor, perf).
The first line must be '<type>: <short description>' in lowercase and under 50 characters.
Use the imperative mood (e.g., 'add' instead of 'added' or 'adds').
Do not end the subject line with a period.
